name: UpdateOperationalTaskConfig
auth_description: Requires a user of type `Employee` or `Api` with functionality `OperationalTasks:Edit`

headers.name: EVA-User-Agent
headers.description: The user agent that is making these calls. Don't make this specific per device/browser but per application. This should be of the form: `MyFirstUserAgent/1.0.0`

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnitID
headers.description: The ID of the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnit-Query
headers.description: The query that selects the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-IDs-Mode
headers.description: The IDs mode to run this request in. Currently only `ExternalIDs` is supported.

request_samples.name: JSON
CURL

F.name: Day
F.description: The how-manieth day of the month. When a DayOfWeek = Monday is provided, this means 1st,2nd,etc.. monday. When DayOfWeek = null is provided, this meanst, 1st,2nd,etc.. day of the month.

F.name: DayOfWeek
F.description:
The day of the week, if set to `null` this means 'any day'
Possible values:

* `0` - Sunday
* `1` - Monday
* `2` - Tuesday
* `3` - Wednesday
* `4` - Thursday
* `5` - Friday
* `6` - Saturday

I.name: Day
I.description: The how-manieth day of the month. When a DayOfWeek = Monday is provided, this means 1st,2nd,etc.. monday. When DayOfWeek = null is provided, this meanst, 1st,2nd,etc.. day of the month.

I.name: DayOfWeek
I.description:
The day of the week, if set to `null` this means 'any day'
Possible values:

* `0` - Sunday
* `1` - Monday
* `2` - Tuesday
* `3` - Wednesday
* `4` - Thursday
* `5` - Friday
* `6` - Saturday

B.name: ExistingTaskBehaviorID
B.description:
Defines how to handle existing tasks when a new task is created with this configuration. Skip: Do not create a new task if one already exists. Replace: Replace the existing task with the new one. Add: Create a new task even if one already exists.
Possible values:

* `0` - Skip
* `2` - Add

B.name: ID
B.description: This is the ID of a `OperationalTaskConfig`

B.name: Name
B.description:
Name of the task. Pass null to remove it and fall back to the survey name.

Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: OnlyTriggerIfStoreOpen
B.description: If true, the task will be created only if the store is open on the day of triggering.

B.name: OrganizationUnitSetID
B.description: This is the ID of a `OrganizationUnitSet`

B.name: RoleIDs
B.description:
The list of roles that these tasks are visible to

This is the ID of a `Role`

B.name: SchedulingConfig
B.description:
Passing this as `null` will remove the scheduling config.

Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: SurveyID
B.description:
Passing this as `null` will remove the survey.

This is the ID of a `Survey`

Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: TriggerEndDate
B.description:
End date for when TriggerOnFinancialPeriodClosed is active. Pass null to remove the restriction.

Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: TriggerOnFinancialPeriodClosed
B.description: Update whether this configuration is triggered when a financial period closes.

B.name: TriggerStartDate
B.description:
Start date for when TriggerOnFinancialPeriodClosed is active. Pass null to remove the restriction.

Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

K.name: Code
K.description: A unique ID identifying this error.

K.name: Message
K.description: A human-readable message describing the error.

K.name: RequestID
K.description: A unique ID identifying the request. Please provide this ID when contacting support.

K.name: Type
K.description: A short description of the error type.

L.name: ExternalIDs
L.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the resolved external IDs.

L.name: IsAsyncResultAvailable
L.description: This is a flag indicating whether the async request is done. If it is `null`, it is not an async service. If it is `false`, the response is not yet available. Do not process the properties in that case. It is is `true` the properties are filled with the result of the call.

L.name: UnresolvedExternalIDs
L.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the external IDs we couldn't resolve.
